about_the_game:
Important information about the Pre-Alpha Demo version


The pre-alpha demo version has been released to show you the overall gameplay concept.
This version has a lot of bugs that will be removed over time. The purpose of this version is to present the current level of work on the game, and to encourage you to support the development of the game through crowdfunding platforms.

What is this game about?

Discover the history of the fall of the Empire, which thanks to technological supremacy have grown for hundreds of years, imposing conquered nations their laws, ideas and religion, while brutally suppressing all forms of resistance. See what happens to society when all dogmas turn out to be fiction.

Let's play some Real Time Strategy!

  • Enjoy the multiplicity of configurations in a complex combat system, allowing you to adapt the weaponry and specialization of your units.
  • Focus on strategy and tactics instead of rage clicking and memorizing keyboard macros.
  • Accept the fact that dice rollovers are cool, and everything that is based on static data is boring.

More information soon.

Add us to your wishlist and wait for news about project development and upcoming demo version.
The work is in progress, so keep an eye on us.

content_descriptors.notes:
The game contains scenes of violence and brutality associated with battles in the medieval-fantasy realities.
There is also occasional nudity.

name: Gates Of a Ruined Empire Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit
  • Processor: 3.2 GHz Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660, Radeon R7 370 or equivalent with 4 GB of video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: The hardware requirements may change as the application develops
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit
  • Processor: 3.2 GHz Quad Core Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 970, Radeon RX 580 or equivalent with 4GB+ of video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: The hardware requirements may change as the application develops

short_description: Immerse yourself in the world of conflict created on the remains of the former Empire. Observe how the surrounding reality changes, when the religion and ideals underlying society turn out to be only a method of control.
